issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
At bootstrap time I am seeing the following FATAL message:
{noformat}
2014-05-02 14:28:45 FATAL | java.lang.RuntimeException: Duplicate configurable field in same config file:
                          | -> com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.entities.S3ProviderConfiguration.S3Endpoint
                          | -> com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.entities.S3ProviderConfiguration.S3Endpoint
java.lang.RuntimeException: Duplicate configurable field in same config file:
-> com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.entities.S3ProviderConfiguration.S3Endpoint
-> com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.entities.S3ProviderConfiguration.S3Endpoint

        at com.eucalyptus.configurable.PropertyDirectory.buildPropertyEntry(PropertyDirectory.java:128)
        at com.eucalyptus.configurable.PropertiesDiscovery.processClass(PropertiesDiscovery.java:89)
        at com.eucalyptus.bootstrap.ServiceJarDiscovery.checkClass(ServiceJarDiscovery.java:293)
        at com.eucalyptus.bootstrap.ServiceJarDiscovery.runDiscovery(ServiceJarDiscovery.java:284)
        at com.eucalyptus.bootstrap.ServiceJarDiscovery.runDiscovery(ServiceJarDiscovery.java:276)
        at com.eucalyptus.bootstrap.Bootstrap.doDiscovery(Bootstrap.java:367)
        at com.eucalyptus.bootstrap.Bootstrap.init(Bootstrap.java:565)
        at com.eucalyptus.bootstrap.SystemBootstrapper.init(SystemBootstrapper.java:200)
2014-05-02 14:28:45 FATAL | java.lang.RuntimeException: Duplicate configurable field in same config file:
                          | -> com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.entities.S3ProviderConfiguration.S3AccessKey
                          | -> com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.entities.S3ProviderConfiguration.S3AccessKey
java.lang.RuntimeException: Duplicate configurable field in same config file:
-> com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.entities.S3ProviderConfiguration.S3AccessKey
-> com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.entities.S3ProviderConfiguration.S3AccessKey

        at com.eucalyptus.configurable.PropertyDirectory.buildPropertyEntry(PropertyDirectory.java:128)
        at com.eucalyptus.configurable.PropertiesDiscovery.processClass(PropertiesDiscovery.java:89)
        at com.eucalyptus.bootstrap.ServiceJarDiscovery.checkClass(ServiceJarDiscovery.java:293)
        at com.eucalyptus.bootstrap.ServiceJarDiscovery.runDiscovery(ServiceJarDiscovery.java:284)
        at com.eucalyptus.bootstrap.ServiceJarDiscovery.runDiscovery(ServiceJarDiscovery.java:276)
        at com.eucalyptus.bootstrap.Bootstrap.doDiscovery(Bootstrap.java:367)
        at com.eucalyptus.bootstrap.Bootstrap.init(Bootstrap.java:565)
        at com.eucalyptus.bootstrap.SystemBootstrapper.init(SystemBootstrapper.java:200)
{noformat}
fields.summary: FATAL message about duplicate configurable fields at bootstrap
